title: LeagueClient.exe - Entry Point Not Found
body:
I have a issue with the game. When i try to start it i get this:   The procedure entry point 
?sendAdditionalFile@MiniDmpSender@@QAEXPB_W@Z could not be located in the dynamic link library NugSplat.dll . And that happend after he latest update i think it was 8.11 but i am not rly sure. Windows 7 and i rly need help i play every day and now i cant. :| :( ;(

replies.body: Same error Riot please fix this error

This happened to me as well right after I updated to the current patch. I really dont want to uninstall the game either.
This happened to me today when I opened league and it told me I had to install last patch because there was a bug now i can't open it :(

It's happenning to me too...
Please Riot tell us what to do i don't wanna reinstall the game!
Pls say I don't have to reinstall >:(
This is happening to me too, and I really don't want to uninstall unless I'm absolutely certain because I've had to reinstall this freaking game 4 times this week. Please someone answer.

OMG finally i was searching 4 hour and finally i got it 
[REMOVED - DON'T DOWNLOAD ANYTHING DIRECTX FROM ANYWHERE EXCEPT MICROSOFT]
press download and copy in league of legendary folder 
this error fixed 
sorry for my bad language
what dll did you replace?

tried it but either I don`t exactly know how to follow this easy steps or it really just don't works :/ 
H E L P

[REMOVED - DON'T DOWNLOAD ANYTHING DIRECTX FROM ANYWHERE EXCEPT MICROSOFT]
1. download this dll file
2. Extract in league of legendary folder (replace )
do you heave a link? please {{champion:32}}
please man give me link
Thanks for this dll link, worked perfectly for me
Worked like a charm, thanks

Thank you so much!!! It worked<3
I love you dude!!!!!!!!!!!!
Riot I am waiting for response!!!!
Same thing here... I would really like to get it fix I don't want to miss event missions ;(
I have the same problem. Riot please help! Do I need to uninstall?? I canâ€™t even run as administrator

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq3

Update and/or reinstall your DirectX is the most likely fix.

NEVER download any .dll files or anything DirectX related from anywhere except Microsoft or the original publisher.

If i didnt download that .dll file this error can not be fixed 
your link could not help me 
but my .dll file replace it works me ?

It comes down to a safety thing. .dll files often have or can have access to your system in places that are very bad to have viruses, so installing or replacing one from a non-reputable source comes with serious risk to your computer.

If it's not a DirectX dll causing the problem it's likely a League one, in which case repairing your client, or failing that running a clean reinstall with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) should do the trick.

i installed hextech repair tool 
it doesn't working 
i started this tool . But it works 1 hour and nothing happen . Second time 50 min works and nothing happens again. This tool really works well ? . Please help me how i fix this error without any .dll file ?

I've never had or heard of any problems with the Hextech Repair Tool. A clean reinstall can take a long time, because it has to uninstall and remove all game files, and then you have to go through the re-installation process, which will be limited by your download speed among other things. It's not a short process, but it's the best way to make sure everything is running properly. 

Does the Tool give you any errors or anything? It's entirely possible it's just still running it's job, not doing nothing, and closing it preemptively may well cause further issues.

If you're still struggling, I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367

then can u help me ?
this direcx doesnt work i installed latest version
I installed the update but after I logged out it and tried to log back in it said LeagueClient.exe - Entry Point Not Found
